<title level="1" right="Action">[Seething Frenzy](/Actions.aspx?ID=761) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Eidolon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=386" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 60 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon's fury boils over into a reckless, out-of-control frenzy. While frenzied, your eidolon is affected by [_boost eidolon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1045) and gains temporary Hit Points equal to your level, but it takes a –2 penalty to AC. Your eidolon can't voluntarily end the frenzy or start another frenzy while in the frenzy. The frenzy lasts for 1 minute, after which it's fatigued for 1 minute and can't start another frenzy for 1 minute.
name: Seething Frenzy
